Title: Requires health benefits for state and retired state employees have the option to only cover the employee or retiree and their spouse or domestic partner
Summary: Requires health benefits for state and retired state employees have the option to only cover the employee or retiree and their spouse or domestic partner.
LawCode: Amd ยง164, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to requiring health benefits for state and retired state employees to have the option to only cover the employee or retiree and their spouse or domestic partner
